amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 118-59 to allow retired federal law enforcement officers to also be eligible to purchase retired service weapons.
amendment.purpose: Amendment allows retired federal law enforcement officers to also be eligible to purchase retired service weapons.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Luttrell amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 232 - 202 (Roll no. 220).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Luttrell.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Luttrell amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 232 - 202 (Roll no. 220).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
